amendment.description: To provide for an independent review and assessment of the organization and management of the Department of Defense for national security in space.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4497 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4497 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6349) To provide for an independent review and assessment of the organization and management of the Department of Defense for national security in space.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4497 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4497 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
